sentences.sContent: the press preview of the show (= when people who write for newspapers, television etc could see it )

phrases.pCn: 影片未公开宣布的预演；内部预映；试映

remMethod.val: pre(预先) ＋ view(观看) → 提前观看 → 预映， 预演

trans.tranCn: 预映， 预演； 预告
trans.tranOther: an occasion when you can see a film, play, painting etc before it is shown to the public
